Song.title: I Shall Not Want
Song.copyright: Â© 2013 Audrey Assad Inc. (Admin. by Audrey Assad / Fortunate Fall Publishing) worshiptogether.com songs (Admin. by Capitol CMG Publishing)

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [| A | B | E/G# | A | A | B | A/C#m B/D# | E | A | B | A A/B | E | ]
Verse 1: From the [C#m]love of my own [A]comf[C#m]ort From the [C#m]fear of having [B/D#]no[E]thing From a [C#m]life of worldly [A]pass[C#m]ions De[A]liver [E]me O [B] God
Verse 2: From the [C#m]need to be [A]under[C#m]stood From the [C#m]need to be ac[B/D#]cept[E]ed From the [C#m]fear of being [A]lone[C#m]ly De[A]liver [E]me O [B] God De[A]liver [E]me O [B] God
Chorus: And I [A]shall not [B]want, I [E/G#]shall not [A]want When I [A]taste Your [B]goodness I [A/C#]shall [B/D#]not [E]want When I [A]taste Your [B]goodness I [A]shall [A/B]not [E]want
Int: [| A2 B | E | A2 B | E |]
{new_page}
Verse 3: From the [C#m]fear of serving [A]oth[C#m]ers From the [C#m]fear of death or [B/D#]tri[E]al From the [C#m]fear of hu[A]mili[C#m]ty De[A]liver [E]me O [B] God De[A]liver [E]me O [B] God
Chorus: And I [A]shall not [B]want, I [E/G#]shall not [A]want When I [A]taste Your [B]goodness I [A/C#]shall [B/D#]not [E]want
No, I [A]shall not [B]want, I [E/G#]shall not [A]want When I [A]taste Your [B]goodness I [A]shall [A/B]not [E]want When I [A]taste Your [B]goodness I [A]shall [A/B]not [E]want
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 from the love of my own comfort from the fear of having nothing from a life of worldly passions deliver me o god verse 2 from the need to be understood from the need to be accepted from the fear of being lonely deliver me o god deliver me o god chorus and i shall not want i shall not want when i taste your goodness i shall not want when i taste your goodness i shall not want int verse 3 from the fear of serving others from the fear of death or trial from the fear of humility deliver me o god deliver me o god chorus and i shall not want i shall not want when i taste your goodness i shall not want no i shall not want i shall not want when i taste your goodness i shall not want when i taste your goodness i shall not want
